topic.title: Directors
topic.section:
The Director oversees the whole process of submission, editorial and publishing for a conference. The Director, working with the Conference Manager, establishes the policies and procedures which are entered in scheduled conference setup. In the editorial process, the Director assigns submissions to the Track Director, watches closely the submission's progress and assists with any difficulties.

For more information, see {help_topic key="editorial.directorsRole" text="Director's Role"}.
